name: St.Mary;s Basilica
description: The first church was constructed in 1912 . It took eight years to complete the building works.St Mary’s Church bell was brought from (France in the year 1891 by Fr. Victor. St Mary’s staticte which was made is a single piece of wood was also brought from Belgiuim by Fr. Victor. The painting picture of St. Mary 8” x 4” size which was at the right side of the alter Bishop Aloysius Maria Benziger 1905 - 1931 presented.It was declared as Minor Basilica by The Pope in 2020.It is the 7th Basilica in Tamilnadu and the First Basilica in Kanniyakumari District.
